name: Sorting Users by "Location" in Aescending order
description:
As a Admin
I want to able to navigate to the 'Manage User' page 
So that I can access its sorting, deleting, and assigning functionalities

steps.name: When  Admin clicks on the "Location" sort icon by 1 click
Then  Admin should see User details are sorted by "Location" Aescending order
